chat_welcome_message: Hello! I'm SEVY AI, and AI specialized in sex education knowledge. How can I help you today?
sevy_introduction: SEVY - SEX EDUCATION FOR VIETNAMESE YOUTH
sevy_introduction_content_line_1: SEVY is a non-profit organization operating in Vietnam.
sevy_introduction_content_line_2: Our mission is to provide free, accessible, and age-appropriate sex education to every children (5 to 18) in Vietnam.
sevy_vision_content_line_1: We believe free and accessible sex education is a fundamental children's right.
sevy_vision_content_line_2: SEVY will gradually bring sex education to every Vietnamese children through in-person teaching in schools and online engagements with SEVY AI.
